wikipedia_page.main: Peter Hayman (born 17 February 1930 in Uxbridge, Middlesex, England) is a British ornithologist and illustrator.

response: * Shorebirds – An Identification Guide to the Waders of the World  by John Marchant, A. J. Prater and Peter Hayman  (paperback)  (hardback).
*The Shell Easy Bird Guide, (illustrated by Peter Hayman) Macmillan 1997,
* Shorebirds - an identification guide to the waders of the world by John Marchant, A. J. Prater and Peter Hayman (1986)
* Peter Hayman (ornithologist) (born 1930), British ornithologist and illustrator
* Peter Hayman (diplomat) (1914–1992), British diplomat and intelligence operative

For his illustrations Harris undertook numerous field studies, which led him chiefly to the Mediterranean and the Middle East. Influenced by Charles Tunnicliffe, Robert Gillmor, Peter Hayman, David Morrison Reid Henry, Robert Bateman and Lars Jonsson, he makes his drawings with watercolors, gouache and acrylic. He is also an admirer of the bird illustrator David Quinn.
